build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --ignore-platform-reqs && php artisan config:clear && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan optimize:clear && php artisan config:cache && php artisan view:cache

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
